item.title: Обо мне
item.description: My interests include Physics, Data Science, Education. Short story For my Master’s degree (theoretical Physics) I was playing with a behavior of a particle transitioning between potential wells. This was addressed using computer simulations in Matlab and Wolfram Mathematica. Later I got interested in psychology, participated in some educational classes, which now, probably, influences my teaching a lot. Then I went to work in IT, playing with algorithms for stock market trading (mostly using C).
